page.title: 11TRADE
page.content:
Eastwick has no shops at all and most shopping is done in Harlow. Roydon has a small number of shops, but only one of these comes in our area - and that happens to be a bookshop.
The Harlow master plan has three types of shopping area. The central shopping area is at The High and includes the enclosed Harvey Centre. Around that are three neighbourhood shopping centres - The Stow, Bush Fair and Staple Tye. None of these is in our area. In addition to these, there are 17 local shopping areas known as 'Hatches'. Little Parndon has one of these - Colt Hatch - and this consists of a row of lock-ups housing, at present, a heating engineer's, a take- away, a hairdresser's, a general
